featuresPage.title: Discover All the Features of CallGuard AI

section1.title: Intelligent AI-Based Call Filtering
section1.p1: Our cutting-edge technology analyzes each incoming call in real time. It compares the number against a global database of spam numbers, continuously updated.
section1.p2: The AI also detects suspicious behavior, such as silent calls, repetitive masked numbers, or typical patterns of fraudulent call centers.

section2.title: Advanced Customization
section2.listItem1: Whitelists and Blacklists: Decide who can call you. Add important contacts to your whitelist to ensure they are never filtered, and permanently block unwanted numbers by adding them to your blacklist.
section2.listItem2: Adjustable Filtering Levels: Choose the level of protection that suits you, from light filtering to strict blocking of all unknown numbers.
section2.listItem3: Custom Notifications: Be informed of blocked calls according to your preferences (discreet notification, daily summary, etc.).

section3.title: Simplified Management and Transparency
section3.listItem1: Filtered Call History: Access a detailed log of all blocked or flagged calls, with the reason for filtering.
section3.listItem2: Usage Statistics: See how many calls have been filtered and gain peace of mind.
section3.listItem3: Intuitive Interface: Easily manage your settings and lists from a simple and clear mobile application.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: CallGuard AI Ltd ('we', 'us', or 'our') is committed to protecting the privacy of its users ('user' or 'you'). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our website [callguardai.example.com] (the 'Site') and our call filtering services (the 'Services').
introduction.p2: Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site or use our services.

dataCollection.title: Collection of Your Information
dataCollection.p1: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways:

item1.title: Personally Identifiable Information:
item1.description: Information you voluntarily provide to us when you register or use our Services, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.

item2.title: Usage Data and Call Logs:
item2.description: Information our servers automatically collect when you access the Site or use the Services, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, access times, and the pages you have viewed directly before and after accessing the Site. For the filtering service, we may collect call metadata (calling numbers, date, time, duration, filtering result) but never the audio content of calls.

item3.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies:
item3.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your interaction with our Site and Services. You can control the use of cookies at the individual browser level.

dataUsage.title: Use of Your Information
dataUsage.p1: Having accurate information about you permits us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you to:
dataUsage.item2: Provide, operate, and improve our Services, including call filtering.
dataUsage.item3: Process your transactions and send related information, including purchase confirmations and invoices.
dataUsage.item4: Send you administrative communications, such as security updates or information about changes to our policies.
dataUsage.item5: Respond to your comments, questions, and requests, and provide customer service.
dataUsage.item6: Monitor and analyze usage trends and activities in connection with our Site and Services.
dataUsage.item7: Personalize and improve the Site and Services and provide advertisements, content, or features that match your interests.
dataUsage.item8: Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations.

dataSharing.title: Disclosure of Your Information
dataSharing.p1: We do not share the personal information we have collected about you except in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.item1: With Your Consent: We may disclose your information to third parties if you have authorized us to do so.
dataSharing.item2: Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party vendors who perform services for us or on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance.
dataSharing.item3: Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information if we are required to do so by law or if we believe in good faith that such action is necessary to comply with a legal obligation, protect and defend our rights or property, prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service, or protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public.
dataSharing.item4: Business Transfers: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another company.

dataSecurity.title: Security of Your Information
dataSecurity.p1: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that no security system is perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.

dataRetention.title: Retention of Your Information
dataRetention.p1: We will retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use your information to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our policies.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.p1: Cookies are small text files placed on your device by websites that you visit. They are widely used in order to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.
cookies.p2: We use the following types of cookies:
cookies.item1: Strictly Necessary Cookies: Essential to enable you to browse the website and use its features.
cookies.item2: Performance/Analytical Cookies: Collect information about how you use our website (e.g., which pages you visit most often). These cookies do not collect information that identifies you.
cookies.item3: Functionality Cookies: Allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
cookies.p3: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect the functionality of this website.

yourRights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
yourRights.p1: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.item1: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data.
yourRights.item2: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate or complete any information you believe is incomplete.
yourRights.item3: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
yourRights.item4: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
yourRights.item5: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
yourRights.item6: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
yourRights.p2: If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@callguardai.example.com.

children.title: Children's Policy
children.p1: Our Services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13 (or the applicable age in your jurisdiction). We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us. If we become aware that we have collected personal data from children without verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information from our servers.
